page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: The area is served by two main roads running North to South(A.49 Preston- Wigan and the B.5250 Eccleston-Standish) interlinked by a network of country lanes.The main feature of communication is the M.6 Motorway.Official direct access to it isunavailable in the immediate vicinity but a motorway service station is sited at Charnock Richard and is important for employment.The services provided are:(1)Fuel,Refreshments and accomodatin. (2)Police. (3)Maintenance. (1)Fuel,Refreshments and Accomodation. This consists of a motel,two garages, two self-service cafeterias,one restaurant and shops,serving both carriageways.Well over 1,000,000.people carered for per annum. 2 to 3,000 meals daily.200employed here
